scripts.cleanup: echo 'Clean up files ...' && rm -rf node_modules test src .bowerrc .DS_Store .gitignore .jshintignore .jshintrc bower.json CHANGELOG.md composer.json composer.lock gulpfile.js LICENSE.md phpspec.yml README.md
scripts.prepare-files: echo 'Preparing files ...' && mkdir ready && rsync -av --exclude=ready * ready && cd ready && echo 'Updating dependencies ...' && bower install && echo 'Building assets ...' && gulp
scripts.publish: npm run prepare-files && cd .. && echo '*** Ready to publish ***'
